query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients) as total_patients,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evolutions) as total_evolutions,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments) as total_appointments;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EhbpnytSh9u8Li.77fae6186695 --database EGarZwiW5PSBt7KQSMeJXj --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients) as total_patients,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evolutions) as total_evolutions,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments) as total_appointments;
